title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique; supplementary warp forming raised pile in plain weave foundation (velvet) with supplementary wefts,
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description:
Delicate white velvet interlacing scrolls which were originally outlined with black velvet (now almost all worn away) on a metallic silver ground.
Selvage at one side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique; supplementary warp forming raised pile in plain weave foundation (velvet) with supplementary wefts,. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-587.
